rules.description: (ti-vim) {vim_key} -> on, {vim_key}, esc, control+[ or any pointing_button -> off
(ti-vim) visual: enter with v. exit with v, escape, I, {vim_key}
(ti-vim) visual: enter with v. exit with v, escape, I, {vim_key}
(ti-vim_) visual: enable left/right shift, disable all other keys

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "add new line to the end of clipboard"'

rules.description: (ti-vim_) disable unused keys in vim mode
